ComicInfo.Title: A Revolution in Oz. Chapter Four: General Orders; Action Figures. Chapter 4 of Cubs in Toyland.
ComicInfo.AlternateSeries: A Revolution in Oz, Cubs in Toyland
ComicInfo.Summary: Therese has been missing for days now, leaving Snow and Bigby frantic. If that weren't bad enough, now Dare can't be found either! What's there to do but turn all of Fabletown and all of The Farm upside down and organize a search party? And in the backup story, the revolution in Oz has been called off. Why? Well, it may have to do with the fact that someone went and hanged their leader. Don't you hate when that happens?
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-05 04:25:51. [CVDB336627] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 21:25:50. [Issue ID 946678]
ComicInfo.Inker: Andrew Pepoy,Shawn McManus,Steve Leialoha,Shawn McManus,Steve Leialoha,Andrew Pepoy
ComicInfo.Locations: Fabletown,Manhattan,Homelands,New York City,New York State,North America,Toyland,The Farm,Oz
